author: Alyssa Bailey
title: Watch Luke Evans and Josh Gad in the First Clip of "Gaston" - Beauty and the Beast Movie Clips
text: No One Sings Like Gaston Like Luke Evans Most Popular By Alyssa Bailey Feb 27, 2017 Behold, proof straight from Disney that Luke Evans's Gaston and Josh Gad's LeFou will be everything you hope they'd be in the live action movie out next month. The studio released the first look at the song "Gaston", and it's the best: Advertisement - Continue Reading Below But what's most incredible is how remarkable it is to the original: The movie comes out March 17 (so close!).
